groups.title: ISIQEPHU A: INDABA
groups.instructions: Khetha isihloko ESISODWA kwezilandelayo ubhale ngaso indaba ibe ngamagama angama-340 kuya kwangama-390. Bhala inombolo kanye nesihloko sendaba yakho.

questions.text: Kwangicacela zisuka nje ukuthi isiphetho sami naye sizoba sihle
Khetha isithombe ESISODWA ubhale ngaso indaba. [Isithombe sengane nomuntu omdala badlala ngamabhulokhi okhuni]
questions.context: Izithombe ezilandelayo zichukuluza imizwa kanye nemicabango. Khetha isithombe ESISODWA ubhale ngaso indaba. Bhala inombolo yombuzo 1.6, 1.7 NOMA 1.8 bese uyinika isihloko indaba yakho. QAPHELA: Indaba yakho mayibe nobudlelwane nesithombe osikhethile.

questions.text: Khetha isithombe ESISODWA ubhale ngaso indaba. [Isithombe sezandla ezivula isikhwama semali esinemali ngaphakathi]
questions.context: Izithombe ezilandelayo zichukuluza imizwa kanye nemicabango. Khetha isithombe ESISODWA ubhale ngaso indaba. Bhala inombolo yombuzo 1.6, 1.7 NOMA 1.8 bese uyinika isihloko indaba yakho. QAPHELA: Indaba yakho mayibe nobudlelwane nesithombe osikhethile.

questions.text: Khetha isithombe ESISODWA ubhale ngaso indaba. [Isithombe somuntu onencwadi esikhundleni sekhanda endaweni eyugwadule]
questions.context: Izithombe ezilandelayo zichukuluza imizwa kanye nemicabango. Khetha isithombe ESISODWA ubhale ngaso indaba. Bhala inombolo yombuzo 1.6, 1.7 NOMA 1.8 bese uyinika isihloko indaba yakho. QAPHELA: Indaba yakho mayibe nobudlelwane nesithombe osikhethile.

groups.title: ISIQEPHU B: IMIBHALO EMIDE EDLULISA IMIYALEZO
groups.instructions: Phendula imibuzo EMIBILI kulesi siqephu. Bhala ngamagama ayi-100 kuya kwayi-120 umbhalo ngamunye.

questions.text: INCWADI YOBUNGANI. Umnewenu ukubhalele incwadi ekwazisa ukuthi usefuna ukuyeka izidakamizwa. Bhala incwadi umhalalisele ngesinqumo asithathile.
I-AJENDA NAMAMINITHI OMHLANGANO. Ikomidi lentsha yangakini libe nomhlangano wokulungiselela idili lomculo elizoba ngoZibandlela. Bhala amaminithi alowo mhlangano.

UMBIKO ONGABEKELWE MGOMO. Ubuphelekezele ugogo nomkhulu wakho beyokhipha imali yempesheni ebhange wabe usubona izigebengu ziqola ezinye izaguga imali. Bhala umbiko ongabekelwe mgomo ozowethula emaphoyiseni.
INKULUMO. UMkhandlu kaMasipala wangakini unikele ngama-laptop kubafundi abaphumelele ngamalengiso kumatikuletsheni. Bhala inkulumo yokubongela laba bafundi.
INKULUMO-MPENDULWANO/INGXOXO. Umama wakho ukubizile efuna ukuba nengxoxo nawe mayelana nabangani abangathembekile ohamba nabo. Bhala Inkulumo-mpendulwano ephakathi kwakho nomama wakho.
IKHARIKHULAMU VITHAYE NENCWADI YOKUZICHAZA. Ubone isikhangisi somsebenzi wokusiza labo abayimilutha yokusebenzisa izidakamizwa. Bhala incwadi nekharikhulamu vithaye.
